summary:
Scott Longval is the President and Chief Executive Officer of Intricon a Joint Development Manufacturer (JDM) of micromedical technology. Intricon components and assemblies advance medical device programs across a range of device platforms for our global customers. 

Intricon offers a unique combination of experience, partnership approach and technical capabilities that integrates focused technical capabilities, prototyping and production experience with proactive pursuit of customer goals, parallel path development and risk sharing to advance medical device program performance and success.

Intricon is the Joint Development Manufacturer that integrates focused technical capabilities, prototyping and production experience with proactive pursuit of customer goals, parallel path development and risk sharing to advance medical device program performance and success. 

As a joint development manufacturer in micromedical technology, we approach medical device programs with an all-in commitment. Speciﬁcally, we’re all-in with you and are able to work with you every step of the way from the earliest idea stages to ongoing production, sharing goals and taking risks on your behalf in order to advance program performance and deliver results. 

Scott joined the company in 2005 and has served as the company’s chief financial officer, chief operating officer and corporate controller. Previously, he was principal project analyst at ADC Telecommunications, Inc., a provider of innovative network infrastructure products and services. He was also manager of financial planning and analysis for Accellent, Inc., formerly MedSource Technologies, a provider of outsourcing solutions to the medical device industry. He served as well as an audit senior at Arthur Andersen. Scott received a B.S. in accounting from the University of St. Thomas.

His mentorship philosophy is - “find something you are passionate about and aggressively pursue it. Never settle. Life is too short, and work is too long not to enjoy what you do every day.”

currentPositions.description:
President and CEO, leading an experienced team of innovative leaders within the medical device industry. I work daily to lead by example through open communications and collaboration in order to build a culture of integrity and respect. 

Intricon is a Joint Development Manufacturer (JDM) of micromedical technology. Intricon components and assemblies advance medical device programs across a range of device platforms for our global customers. 

We’re here to partner with you to help you get to market on time and on budget with our unique combination of technical capabilities. With our focus on key device platforms, Intricon helps you advance clinical outcomes by always looking ahead with proactive support and resources.
currentPositions.title: President and CEO

headline: President and CEO at Intricon ● Innovative Manufacturer of Micromedical Technology for the Medical Device Industry

message.text: Excited for Scott Drikakis to head up our Sales & Marketing team!

ingestedContentSummary.description: Intricon is pleased to announce Scott Drikakis as Vice President, Sales and Marketing. Scott comes to Intricon with 20+ years of experience.
ingestedContentSummary.title: Intricon hires Scott Drikakis as Vice President - Intricon

message.text:
We are thrilled to announce that Scott Drikakis has joined Intricon Corporation as our new VP of Sales and Marketing! With over 20 years of experience in global medical device and healthcare sales and market development, Scott brings a wealth of knowledge and a proven track record of driving strategies that enhance scalability and spur growth.

Scott's expertise will be instrumental in propelling #Intricon forward as we continue to innovate and deliver cutting-edge medical device solutions that positively impact patient care and outcomes.

Please join us in welcoming Scott to the team—we're excited to achieve great things together! 

https://lnkd.in/g7qijmkR
